body.title: Front End Web Developer
body: I am Francisco Valle, a Salvadoran software engineer specialized in the development of dynamic and static web pages.

I started as a web application programmer since 2020, when I created simple applications with HTML and CSS in university. Over the years, my experience has grown in web development companies, and I build complete applications with the help of React using TypeScript.
I really enjoy movies and anime; I even watch doramas from time to time, but my favorite pastime is playing video games. I love series like Metal Gear and Resident Evil.
